net.clackrouter.jgraph.utils
Class HTMLPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                  javax.swing.JEditorPane
                      net.clackrouter.jgraph.utils.HTMLPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class HTMLPane
extends javax.swing.JEditorPane

This pane extends JEditorPane's functionality to add support for HTML related display and behavior. Specifically, it handles the necessary implementation to support URL tooltip support and launching of a platform specific HTML/Internet browser.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

HTMLPane

public HTMLPane()
Convenience constructor with no required parameters which automatically creates an uneditable editor instance.

HTMLPane

public HTMLPane(boolean editable)
Constructor for the HTMLPane object

Parameters:
editable - If true, this component supports HTML editing. This class only manages the tooltip and URL mouse events, not any graphical layout and editing capability. This class could be used, however, in building such a tool as it does have support for disabling URL tracking during editing (ie no launch of browser or tooltip display).
Method Detail

public java.lang.String getToolTipText(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
Override tool tip method to display URL

Overrides:

Parameters:
event - event passed
Returns:
tooltip as URL

getToolTipLocation

public java.awt.Point getToolTipLocation(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
Override Swing's poor label position choice. The new behaviour shows the label relative to the current location of the mouse.

Overrides:
getToolTipLocation in class javax.swing.JComponent
Parameters:
event - tool tip location event
Returns:
tool tip location

isHoveringOverHyperlink

public boolean isHoveringOverHyperlink()
Determines if current mouse location is hovering over a hyperlink. Remember, CustomLinkHandler is NOT notified of hyperlink events if editing is enabled by defintion in JEditorPane. In otherwords, when HTML code is being displayed, then hyperlink tracking is not occuring.

Returns:
true if mouse if hovering over hyperlink and pane is not editable

getHoveredURL

public java.lang.String getHoveredURL()
Gets the URL being hovered over.

Returns:
The URL value if mouse is currently hovering over a URL, or null if not currently hovering over a URL
